title: Gushwork bets on AI search for customer leads â€” and early results are emerging
author: Jagmeet Singh
content: Gushwork has raised $9 million in a seed round led by SIG and Lightspeed. The startup has seen early customer traction from AI search tools like ChatGPT.

aiAnalysis.summary: Gushwork secures $9M seed funding to expand its AI-powered customer lead generation platform, leveraging ChatGPT and other AI search tools to help businesses find qualified prospects.
keyPoints: $9 million seed round led by SIG and Lightspeed
Early traction from ChatGPT and AI search integrations
Helps businesses identify and qualify potential customers
